title: m5.2xlarge prod-web-server-01 under 8.3% CPU utilization
suggested_action: Downsize to m5.large or enable auto-scaling on the ASG with CPU and request-rate targets.
methodology: 30d CloudWatch CPU, network, and load metrics vs. instance right-sizing guidance.

title: Cost anomaly in Lambda: +$64.59 daily spike
suggested_action: Identify function(s) with sudden invocations or duration growth; add concurrency limits and alerts.
commands: aws ce get-cost-and-usage --time-period Start=2025-08-23,End=2025-08-24 --granularity DAILY --metrics BlendedCost --group-by Type=DIMENSION,Key=SERVICE
methodology: Daily cost diffs with 7-day rolling baseline; outlier flagged at >3Ïƒ.

title: Unattached EBS volume temp-migration-vol (467GB) in us-west-2
suggested_action: Snapshot if needed, then delete the unattached volume.
methodology: Inventory diff with attachment state + gp2/gp3 price model.

title: Unused Elastic IP in us-east-1 (2128h unused)
suggested_action: Release unused EIP to stop hourly charges.
methodology: EC2 address allocation inventory and association status.

suggested_action: Release unused Elastic IP to stop hourly charges.

methodology: ALB/NLB CloudWatch RequestCount + hourly pricing model.

title: Idle RDS read replica for production database
suggested_action: Remove or downsize the replica; enable performance insights before removal.
methodology: 30d CPU/IO + replication metrics vs. workload traffic.

title: S3 bucket logs-archive missing IA/Glacier transition policy
suggested_action: Add lifecycle policy to move objects >30d to S3 IA and >90d to Glacier.
methodology: Bucket size by storage class + lifecycle rules audit.

title: NAT Gateway with minimal traffic in us-east-1
suggested_action: Replace with NAT instance for low-throughput workloads; add egress allowlist.
methodology: 30d NAT data processed/hrs vs. fixed hourly pricing.

title: Reserved Instance opportunity for m5.4xlarge workloads
suggested_action: Consider 1-year Reserved Instances for consistent 24/7 usage patterns.
methodology: Analysis of 30-day usage patterns and AWS Reserved Instance pricing comparison.
